products.name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Experience high-quality sound with these wireless Bluetooth headphones. Perfect for music lovers on the go.

products.name: Smart Fitness Tracker
products.description: Track your fitness journey with this smart fitness tracker. Features include heart rate monitoring, step counting, and more.

products.name: Portable Power Bank
products.description: Never run out of battery with this portable power bank. Compact and powerful, it's the perfect travel companion.

products.name: 4K Ultra HD Action Camera
products.description: Capture every moment in stunning 4K with this ultra HD action camera. Waterproof and rugged for all your adventures.

products.name: Smart Home Speaker
products.description: Control your smart home with ease using this smart home speaker. Voice commands make it simple to play music, check the weather, and more.
